author: Special Correspondent
text:
The following express special trains will be run to clear the extra rush of traffic February 22, in connection with Mahamaham festival in Kumbakonam. Mela charges as applicable, shall be levied on the tickets during the festival.

The Thanjavur - Mayiladuthurai Express Specials (07686, 07688, 07690, 07692) will leave Thanjavur at 12.35 p.m., 2.15 p.m., 4.10 p.m., and 6.50 p.m. respectively. At Kumbakonam, the arrival/departure timings of these trains are 1.25 p.m.;/1.30 p.m.; 315/3.20 p.m.; 5.15 p.m. /5.20 p.m.; and 7.35 p.m./7.40 p.m. At Mayiladuturai, it will be 2.35 p.m.; 4.15 p.m.; 6.30 p.m.;10.55 p.m.

The Mayiladuthurai-Thanjavur Express specials (07683; 07685 and 07687) will leave Mayiladuthurai at 8.30 a.m., 9.35 a.m. and noon respectively. The departure/arrival timings at Kumbakonam are 9.20 a.m./9.25 a.m.; 10.10 a.m. / 10.15 a.m.; 12.45 p.m. / 12.50 p.m. The trains will reach Thanjavur at 11 a.m., 11.50 a.m. and 2.10 p.m. respectively.

The Mayiladuthurai –Thanjavur Express specials trains (07689, 07691, 07693, and 07695) will leave Mayiladuthurai at 3.20 p.m., 4.35 p.m., 10.50 p.m., and 11.10 p.m. respectively. The trains will arrive and depart at Kumbakonam at 3.55 p.m./4.p.m., 5.15 p.m./5.20 p.m., 9.25 p.m./9.30 p.m. and 11.40 p.m./11.45 p.m.

The trains will reach Thanjavur at 5.25 p.m., 6.10 p.m., 10.35 p.m., and 1.15 a.m.

The trains 07676 and 07695 will stop at Kuttalam, Aduthurai, Kumbakonam, Sundaraperumalkoil, Papanasam and Pandaravadai. The other special trains will stop at all stations between Mayiladuturai and Thanjavur except Malliyam.

The composition of all the above trains will be 16 Second Class DEMU coaches.
title: Special trains for Mahamaham
